summary.para: Converts Direct2D primitives in the passed-in command list into a fixed page representation for use by the print subsystem.

param.name: commandList
param.para: The command list that contains the rendering operations.

param.name: pageSize
param.para: The size of the page to add.

param.name: tag1
param.para: Contains the first label for subsequent drawing operations. This parameter is passed uninitialized. If NULL is specified, no value is retrieved for this parameter.

param.name: tag2
param.para: Contains the second label for subsequent drawing operations. This parameter is passed uninitialized. If NULL is specified, no value is retrieved for this parameter.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

item.description: Direct2D could not allocate sufficient memory to complete the call.
An invalid parameter was passed to the returning function.
The print job is already finished.

summary.para: Passes all remaining resources to the print sub-system, then clean up and close the current print job.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

item.description: Direct2D could not allocate sufficient memory to complete the call.
An invalid parameter was passed to the returning function.
The print job is already finished.

summary.para: Converts Direct2D primitives stored in an into a fixed page representation. The print sub-system then consumes the primitives.
